When I was attending Brigham Young

9.text: I was given a unique opportunity

and as I told him about my life and my
family he looked deeply into my eyes

27.text: he reached for his wifes hand and said

31.text: I would like to you to meet my queen

They're seated next to him was his wife
Emma Ray Mckay

39.text: Although she did not wear a

40.text: crown of sparkling diamonds, nor was she's seated on a throne

and her pure eyes sparkled like

Her's was a beauty that cannot be

58.text: years of seeking the best gifts

hard work, of faithfully enduring trials with

75.text: On that day in Huntsville, Utah I was reminded of my divine identity and I

81.text: learned about what I now call deep beauty

92.text: It is the kind of beauty

98.text: It is the kind of beauty that doesn't wash off

103.text: when you are virtuous chased and moraly clean your inner beauty glows in your eyes and in your face

123.text: Young women, look into the mirror of eternity, remember who you are

129.text: See yourself as our Heavenly Father sees you. You are elect. You are of  noble birth

139.text: You were born to be a queen
